biography:
Corinne Jorry (born 23 April 1943) is a French costume designer. She was nominated four times for the CÃ©sar Award for Costume Design, which she won for her work in the film All the World's Mornings (1991). She was also nominated for the Academy Award for Best Costume Design for her work in Madame Bovary (1991).
